title: Web crawling with R part 2: Power laws and enlightened squirrels
description: In this post we analyze the data we scraped in part one of the web crawling with R series. We find that the degree distribution of the hyperlink 2-neighborhood of the English Wikipedia page for "Squirrel" follows a power-law distribution and stumble across some unexpected topics in our network.

title: Web crawling with R part 1: Teaching rvest how to crawl
description:
rvest is a great package for downloading information from the internet straight into your R session. 
However, it does not natively "crawl" the web, i.e. traverse from one website to another. So let's teach it!

title: The list of things we all know we should know
description:
Welcome to my new blog, SteinsZeit. I hope you enjoy 
reading what I have to say! For my first blog post I have compiled a list of useful maths and programming 
references and guides.
